description:
Having seen the magazine article, the Acting Clubs asks the Underwear Society to help make their costumes and appear in their play. Nayu still has not informed the society members she will be moving to Kyoto with Keigo. Kiyono and Komachi express their concerns, but Nayu refuses to tell anyone about her move to Kyoto until after the cultural festival. On the day of the festival, Tsukamoto-sensei finds out about the magazine article and puts the play on hold.
Source: crunchyroll
